Title: Parameters
BaseEnergyLoss.Tooltip: The base amount of energy deducted every ten minutes.
EnergyFloor.Tooltip: The maximum energy at which Energy Rework's energy loss no longer occurs.
MovingEnergyOffset.Tooltip: The amount of additional energy lost when running.
SittingEnergyOffset.Tooltip: The amount of energy gained every ten minutes while seated.
SittingEnergyCeiling.Tooltip: The maximum energy at which Energy Rework's sitting energy gain no longer occurs.
